In a new interview with ex`` American Idol'' judge Simon Cowell , Oprah Winfrey peels away a few layers from this complicated man she calls the world's most famous talent scout. The interview for her new network show called`` Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class'' delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful. It makes me jaded and makes me lose faith in humanity some time because I don't understand how people can do that to innocent animals. That comment from Jamie Buehrle carries a direct line to Michael Vick , who was presented with the NFL's Comeback Player of the Year Award this past weekend.
